programme.desc: Queen and I: 'Queen and I' is a love story that transcends time, as it brings together two different people from the past and the present.

programme.desc: The World of Fantasy: A young man with amnesia and his childhood sweetheart grow up in the spirit domain to search for the meaning of life and pursue a higher power.

programme.title: Jumong
programme.desc: Jumong: 'Jumong' is a tale of a hero whose legacy to the Korean people is his great historical triumph against thousands of armies to win back the skies of his old kingdom, the Old Joseon, and establish what would become the great Goguryeo Dynasty.
